players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
Diana: "I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. Stay alert."
You: "I'm keeping my eyes open. Be careful, Diana."
Charlie: "Charlie will likely suspect me now. Alice, stay hidden and gather info."
Diana: "Staying silent. Keep an eye on Charlie and Bob."
You: "Observing everyone. Stay cautious, Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
Diana: "I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. Stay alert."
Bob: "I'm keeping my eyes open. Be careful, Diana."
You: "Charlie will likely suspect me now. Alice, stay hidden and gather info."
Diana: "Staying silent. Keep an eye on Charlie and Bob."
Bob: "Observing everyone. Stay cautious, Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana is mafia. Be cautious."
You: "I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. Stay alert."
Bob: "I'm keeping my eyes open. Be careful, Diana."
Charlie: "Charlie will likely suspect me now. Alice, stay hidden and gather info."
You: "Staying silent. Keep an eye on Charlie and Bob."
Bob: "Observing everyone. Stay cautious, Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
